column1: Is this article subject to HHMI's policy (a major contribution from an HHMI lab on an original research article describing novel results, protocols, or methods)?
column2: Is this article subject to the 2024 NIH Public Access Policy (NIH funding on any article accepted by a journal on or after July 1, 2025)? Note that this policy does not apply to publications arising from awards that were closed prior to July 1, 2025.
column3: Where are you in the publishing process?
column4:
Do you plan to publish this paper open access at a journal?

This means the text will be freely available to read on the journal website, without a paywall, immediately upon publication (no embargo). In most cases, this requires paying the journal an open access fee.
column5:
Is the paper being published with a CC BY license?

(Only ask if "open access" is "yes")
column6: Next Step or Help Text

column6: Proceed to bioRxiv submission; reminder to publish revised preprints
